alert.note: Alert for Santa Cruz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 19 at 9:48PM MST until August 20 at 12:45AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of Southeast Arizona, including the following counties, Cochise and Santa Cruz. * WHEN...Until midnight MST. * IMPACTS...River or stream flows are elevated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 943 PM MST, Heavy rainfall earlier along the Upper Babocomari River has created elevated flows from east of Elgin to near Tombstone. The Upper Babocomari River near Fort Huachuca is currently at 8.93 feet. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... areas along the Upper Babocomari River. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
